text: Did LoopVectorization made it in into the Julia 1.6 code base?
No, AFAIK there has not been any attempts for that even. Where was that suggested?

elements.text: No, AFAIK there has not been any attempts for that even. Where was that suggested?

text: In fact, I think there is more effort to move things out of Base than into Base

text: There are reasons to consider making LV a compiler transform rather than its current `@generated` architecture, but we may be able to do that as a plugin.
